description: Enterprise techniques used by Indicator Removal on Host Mitigation, ATT&CK mitigation T1070 v1.0
name: Indicator Removal on Host Mitigation (T1070)

techniques.comment: Automatically forward events to a log server or data repository to prevent conditions in which the adversary can locate and manipulate data on the local system. When possible, minimize time delay on event reporting to avoid prolonged storage on the local system.
